title: Story Sections

sub_fields.label: Vimeo Embed code
sub_fields.name: vimeo_embed_code
sub_fields.instructions: Use the share code from Vimeo here.

sub_fields.label: Pull Quote Color
sub_fields.name: pquote_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Remember that your choice will be overridden if a background colour has already been set on the card or section this quote is used in.

sub_fields.label: Whose quote is this?
sub_fields.name: bquote_source_individual
sub_fields.instructions: Although you can still add an individual's name here, normally a description might be enough!

sub_fields.label: Select Block Graphic
sub_fields.name: cta_block_graphic_select
sub_fields.instructions: Select an SVG image from the library

sub_fields.label: Marker Link
sub_fields.name: map_marker_link
sub_fields.instructions: If you want the marker's label to link to a story or collaboration page, select the relationship here.

sub_fields.label: Select collaborations
sub_fields.name: map_collaborations
sub_fields.instructions: Select the collaboration(s) you would like to display on the map

sub_fields.label: Zoom Level
sub_fields.name: map_zoom_level
sub_fields.instructions: A higher number means a smaller area on the map.

sub_fields.label: Caption
sub_fields.name: map_caption
sub_fields.instructions: If you want to add a caption to your map, add it here.

description: Add (coloured) sections to pages or stories
